articles.title: PM Modi Inaugurates Mega Solar Park in Gujarat
articles.heading: Renewable Energy Push
articles.subheading: India’s biggest solar initiative lights up 1 million homes
articles.description: Prime Minister Narendra Modi today inaugurated the largest solar park in India, located in Gujarat. The park is expected to power over a million homes and contribute significantly to India’s green energy goals.

articles.title: Modi Addresses Nation on Independence Day
articles.heading: Independence Day 2025
articles.subheading: Emphasizes youth, digital growth, and national unity
articles.description: On the 78th Independence Day, PM Modi focused on youth empowerment, digital transformation, and India's mission to become a global leader by 2047. The speech was widely praised for its clarity and vision.

articles.title: India Hosts Historic G20 Summit Under Modi's Leadership
articles.heading: Global Diplomacy
articles.subheading: Landmark agreements signed at G20 New Delhi 2025
articles.description: The G20 Summit held in New Delhi was a major diplomatic success, with PM Modi facilitating key agreements on climate change, AI governance, and global trade restructuring.
